The claim was published in an article on: 2020, titled "UN Forced to Admit Gates-funded Vaccine Is Causing Polio Outbreak in Africa."
The article referenced a September 1: 2020, WHO report on "circulating vaccine-derived poliovirus cases" in several African countries.
The claim has been shared on multiple pl: including websites, Facebook, Twitter, and Reddit.
The WHO spokesperson: Oliver Rosenbauer, stated that the claim is "plain wrong" and explained that polio outbreaks are mainly a result of low vaccination coverage, not a side effect of vaccination.
